title: Welcome to Infinitum Block Smash!
content: Thank you for playing our game! We hope you enjoy it.

title: Found a Bug or Have a Feature Request?
content: Please report any bugs, issues, or feature requests in our Discord or by emailing support@infinitumlive.com.

title: ðŸ”¥ Firebase Outage - June 12, 2025
content: Earlier today we experienced issues with Firebase, which caused login failures and leaderboard problems. This has now been fully resolved as of 4:30 PM EST on 6/12/2025.
